title: Russian Forces, Seeking Rare Progress, Push on Eastern City
description: Ukrainian officials said Russia had launched attacks from several directions on Bakhmut, though analysts said taking it would yield little strategic value.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: Civilians crossing the remains of a bridge destroyed by Russian bombardment in Bakhmut, Ukraine, on Saturday.
